name: Lovely Adventure
description:
Avilable on Android (Early Prototype)   An adventure with a sluggish spirit doll, through the rainforest then into the dark chamber and ending in a suburban reservoir.  Funny and very short playtime.

 INSTRUCTIONS: - Click on X or left click button use in dialog box.  - Sidekick/Spirit doll is draggable with hold left click. - Any touch on screen or X to shoot.
